entries.name: 360 Face Camera
entries.description: Enables 360-degree facial camera control for immersive portraits.
entries.examples: "360 face camera, immersive portrait, rotating view, detailed expression"
entries.usage: Recommended strength 0.8-1.0, best at 512x768 resolution with DPM++2M sampler and 20-30 steps.

entries.name: Better Close-Up Quality
entries.description: Enhances close-up shots with sharp details.
entries.examples: "close-up portrait, sharp details, clear skin texture, soft focus background"
entries.usage: Trained on 92 files (61 videos, 31 images) at 33 frames each, recommended strength 0.7-1.0.

entries.name: Candid Change
entries.description: Supports natural transitions in candid scenes.
entries.examples: "candid transition, natural pose, outdoor setting, smooth scene change"
entries.usage: V2 trained on a larger dataset, better for "obscured camera" look, recommended strength 0.6-0.9.

entries.description: HunyuanVideo LoRA - Adds cinematic camera movements.

entries.usage: add details for the surroundings in the prompt, strength 1

entries.name: Female Face Portraits
